title: geth cannot connect on rinkeby!
body:
Hi there, when I connected to rinkeby the error is follow:

INFO [09-28|10:41:09] Maximum peer count                       ETH=30 LES=0 total=30

Protocol Versions: [63 62]

Operating System: linux
GOPATH=/root/go
GOROOT=/usr/local/go

when i delete some last ldb files and delete LOG and MANIFEST-341852 and modify CURRENT file then restart geth . And it worked again!

delete file list:
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 2122855 Sep 28 14:13 342551.ldb
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   13385 Sep 28 14:13 342552.ldb 
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root      16 Sep 28 14:12 CURRENT.bak
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root       0 Sep 28 14:09 LOCK
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root  356535 Sep 28 14:15 LOG
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 1048635 Sep 28 14:15 LOG.old
-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 3521726 Sep 28 14:15 MANIFEST-341852

modify CURRENT file content to:
MANIFEST-342550
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
